name: Fellowes Saturn 125 Thermal Laminator Machine for Home or Office with Pouch Starter Kit, 12.5 inch, Fast Warm-Up, Jam-Free Design (5736601)
short_description: FASTER LAMINATION: Spend less time waiting with a 60-second warmup thanks to InstaHeat technology
RAPID PRECISION: Laminates 19” per minute with consistently perfect results for your home, small office, or classroom
JAM-FREE PRODUCTIVITY: With jam detection and a jam release lever that quickly releases pouches for re-centering or removal, the Saturn 125 is optimized for the busy office and school
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Developed by the most trusted name in business machines, the Saturn 125 demonstrates Fellowes’ commitment to quality and innovation
CLEANING MADE EASY: Maintain your laminator’s reliability and longevity with CleanAlert reminders to run through a cleaning sheet
FLEXIBLE DESIGN: Maximum document width of 12.5” makes the Saturn 125 perfect for most professional, educational, or legal documents
MULTIPLE SHEET SETTINGS: Choose between 3-mil, 4-mil, or 5-mil laminator sheets for hot lamination, or a cold setting for self-adhesive pouches
ENERGY-EFFICIENT PERFORMANCE: Automatically shuts-off after 30 minutes of non-use
product_description: When protecting valuable or heavily handled documents in your office or classroom, trust the rapid precision of the Fellowes Saturn 125 Thermal Laminator Machine. Thoughtfully and beautifully designed to keep pace with your workflow, the Saturn 125 is warmed up and ready for lamination work within 60 seconds, all made possible by Fellowes’ InstaHeat technology. For fast and reliable performance, the Saturn 125´s improved internal mechanics allow you to laminate up to 19” per minute with perfect results. Flexible and intuitive, the Saturn 125 can fit documents up to 12.5” wide, and allows you to choose between 3-mil, 4-mil, or 5-mil laminator sheets for hot lamination, or a cold setting for self-adhesive pouches. But unlike other laminators, different pouch thicknesses don’t mean frustrating jams. The Saturn 125 features advanced sensors to detect jams forming and notify you via a red light, as well as a quick release lever to recenter or remove jammed pouches. And when it is time to maintain your machine with a cleaning sheet, the integrated CleanAlert provides a gentle reminder. The Saturn 125 is one of the latest product innovations from Fellowes, with the quality and performance you expect from the most trusted name in lamination.

name: Laminator Machine 9-Inch Portable Thermal Laminater with Hot & Cold Modes, A4 Small Laminating Machine with ABS Jam-Release, 3-Min Warm-Up, 6-in-1 Photo Laminator Kit for Home and Class, White
short_description: 3-Minute Warm-Up to Save Your Time: We know your time is precious, whether you're a busy teacher preparing classroom materials or a parent laminating cherished family photos. That’s why this laminator warms up in just 3 minutes! No long waits, no wasted moments—get your tasks done faster so you can focus on what really matters.

Dual Modes for Perfect Results: Whether you're working with standard documents or delicate, heat-sensitive materials, this laminator has you covered. Use hot mode for regular papers, photos, and certificates (compatible with the thermal laminating pouches included in your kit). For cold mode, pair it with self-adhesive laminating sheets (not included) to protect stickers, old photographs, or fragile items without any heat.

Quiet Operation for Peaceful Productivity: Tired of noisy machines disturbing your creative flow? This laminator works quietly, perfect for classrooms, home, or even late-night crafting sessions while the sleep. Let your productivity shine without the noise, creating a calm and focused workspace for everyone.

Say Goodbye to Jammed Papers and Frustration: We’ve all been there: a jammed laminator ruining your important project. With the ABS Jam-Release button, you’ll never feel that stress again. Quickly fix jams and protect your documents without tearing or crinkling. To avoid jams: Ensure the sealed edge of the pouch enters first. Avoid using pouches that are too thick or thin (use 3-4.5 mil pouches for the best results).

Compact Design That Fits Your Life: Big, bulky laminator machines are a thing of the past. This sleek, small laminator is designed to fit anywhere—your desk, classroom, or even a drawer when not in use. It’s lightweight, portable, and perfect for laminating on the go, whether you’re a teacher, student, or parent organizing precious memories.

If the laminator does not turn on, first check that the plug is secure and allow 3–5 minutes for preheating. If paper gets stuck, stop laminating immediately and slide the ABS release lever to remove the sheet safely. Never pull the paper by force. This protects both your document and the laminator. If the issue continues, our customer service team is ready to help you step by step.

name: 13 Inch Laminator Machine, A-3 9-in-1 Thermal Laminator with Sheets for Hot & Cold Laminating Machine, Features Fast 60-Sec Warm Technology and Never-Jam Design for Home,Office,or School Use (Black)
short_description: 【New Upgraded 9-in-1 Lamination Machine】 Crafted from high-molecular construction materials for unparalleled durability, adding stylish flair to your studio. Dive into endless creative possibilities! This thermal laminator includes a built-in paper cutter, corner rounder, hole punch, 3 binder rings, and laminating paper – everything you need to kickstart your laminating journey is right here.

【Hot & Cold Dual-Function Laminator】 This 13x17 laminator offers dual-mode functionality for both cold and hot laminating. This versatility lets you choose the ideal method for any project, whether working with heat-sensitive materials or traditional thermal laminating.

【60-Second Warm-Up for Instant Laminating】 Say goodbye to long waits! Our laminator heats up in just 60 seconds, letting you start laminating instantly. With a remarkable laminating speed of up to 450mm/min – 80% faster than many competitors – it ensures you finish projects quickly. No more delays due to sluggish machines. Revolutionize your workflow and take your projects to new heights.

【Dual Roll System & Intelligent Protection】 The dual-roll system ensures precise heat and pressure for impeccable lamination, preventing wrinkles, blisters, and curling. An intelligent temperature control system boosts safety and efficiency while extending the laminator’s lifespan. The auto shut-off function keeps you safe and conserves energy at school, the office, or home.

【Portable 13-inch Laminating Machine】 Our laminator (including sheets) accommodates paper and photos of various sizes: A-3, A4, A5, and A6. It’s compatible with both 3 mil and 5 mil laminating paper, handling Legal, Letter, business card, and photo-sized documents. For optimal results, ensure you select pouches that are 3-5 mil (80–100 microns) thick.

【Easy Operation & Jam-Free Performance】 This laminate machine (including laminated paper) features simple operation with no complex setups. An intuitive control panel and user-friendly interface make laminating a breeze. Thanks to the short warm-up time and fast lamination speeds, you can achieve professional results effortlessly. Say goodbye to frustrating paper jams – just press the ABS button to clear them instantly and safeguard your important documents.
